name: Alice_Brady
text:
Alice Brady
"Oh, it fell down."
Alice Brady was an employee at a bank where Laura Palmer kept a safety deposit box.
Following Laura's murder, Alice gave FBI Special Agent Dale Cooper and Sheriff Harry S. Truman her safety deposit box that she kept at the bank for about six months.
Behind the scenes
In the pilot's original script, Alice was a uniformed bank guard. It is unknown if the bank Alice works at is the Twin Peaks Savings and Loan.
